Plot: Lt. John Dunbar, exiled to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.
Title: Dances with Wolves
Actors: Kevin Costner, Mary McDonnell, Graham Greene, Rodney A. Grant
tomatoConsensus: A grand, sweeping epic with inarguably noble intentions and arresting cinematography, but one whose center, arguably, is not as weighty as it should be.
